text: Extended collaboration could result in chips built on 32-nanometer technology.
headline: IBM, AMD Work to Shrink Chips

text: BAGHDAD (Reuters) - Al Qaeda-linked militants said they had  killed a second American hostage and threatened to kill a  Briton unless women prisoners in Iraq were freed.
headline: Group in Iraq Says Kills Second U.S. Hostage

text: AOL is getting serious about security - if you pay them an extra \$1.95 to \$4.95 a month. Grandma #39;s favorite ISP has teamed with RSA Security to offer an optional login service that provides a second layer of authentication to prevent identity theft.
headline: AOL: Serious about security - for a price
